name: Flashdark (kuviman, Brainoid, Rincs)
description:
There's something wrong at your Grandmother's house...

A horror game where you see the dark world using your flashdark and solve puzzles while avoiding the ghost.

TRAILER

Controls

  • WASD - movement
  • Mouse move - look around
  • Mouse buttons or E - interact
  • C - toggle crouching ( make less noise )
  • Q or G - drop the item
  • P or Enter or Escape - pause
  • F11 - toggle fullscreen
